title: Kuwait National Stadium
text: Kuwait National Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Kuwait%20City">Kuwait City</a>, <a href="Kuwait">Kuwait</a>. It is used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The stadium holds 16,000. It was the home ground of the <a href="Kuwait%20national%20football%20team">Kuwait national football team</a>.
